snippet: About 3,600 students were evacuated from Seven Lakes High School in the Houston suburb of Katy after the authorities there discovered a suspicious device in a backpack, officials said.
abstract: About 3,600 students are evacuated from Seven Lakes High School in Houston suburb of Katy after authorities discover suspicious device in backpack, later determined to be homemade weapon known as zip gun.
lead_paragraph: About 3,600 students were evacuated from Seven Lakes High School in the Houston suburb of Katy after the authorities there discovered a suspicious device in a backpack, officials said.
